channel.title: Help with Wildy Please 317 (delta base)
channel.description:
Okay theres a Few things i want to know first, How do you make ceartin spots Safe spot and ceartin spots unsafe spots
also if your in level 1 wildy how do u make it like lvl 10 in ceartin areas? Or just higher lvl wildy area thanks for your time

item.title: Help with Wildy Please 317 (delta base)
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

if((AttackingOn2.combatLevel + wildyLevel < combatLevel - 9 || combatLevel + wildyLevel < AttackingOn2.combatLevel - 9) && !isInPitGame()){ sM("Your level difference is too great! Lvl 1 wild is really 10!"); sM("You need to move deeper into the Wilderness."); faceNPC(32768 + AttackingOn); break; }

if((castOnPlayer.combatLevel + wildyLevel < combatLevel - 9 || combatLevel + wildyLevel < castOnPlayer.combatLevel - 9) && !isInPitGame()){ sM("Your level difference is too great! Lvl 1 wild is really 10!"); sM("You need to move deeper into the Wilderness."); toX = absX; toY = absY; break; }

Read full topic
